text: The Cave of the Yellow Dog (; ) is a 2005 Mongolian German children's drama movie directed by Byambasuren Davaa and starring Urjindorjyn Batchuluun, Buyandulamyn Daramdadi, Batchuluuny Nansal. == Other websites == * Category:2005 drama movies Category:Mongolian movies Category:German drama movies Category:Movies directed by Byambasuren Davaa
title: The Cave of the Yellow Dog
